price: 99. Hadduu doono Rabbigaa, way rumayn lahaayeen waxa dhulka jooga oo dhan kulligood. Ee ma waxaad adigu khasbi dadka jeer ay noqdaan mu’miniin.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكۡرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka laāmana man fī al-arḍi kulluhum jamīʿan afa-anta tuk'rihu al-nāsa ḥattā yakūnū mu'minīna
